ResearchProjectDef.label: AR - Adaptation Refusal
ResearchProjectDef.description:
While most survivors of a crash try to adapt and coexist to the environment of the planet
they are on, your colonist utterly refuse to do so. With this research, colonists will be
able to build a moisture converter to prepare synthesized energy drinks and bottle them
in small canisters.

Unlocks Building:
Moisture Converter

Unlocks food:
Electrolytic Solution

ResearchProjectDef.label: AR - Algae-Kryll farming
ResearchProjectDef.description:
The colonists have noticed that even if synthetized energy drinks can sustain an individual
for some time, real food really is necessary. By adapting an abandoned Explorator-Korps technology they can build small bio-matter farms where Algae-Kryll (a modified krill)
can be grown and collected.

Unlocks Building:
Algae-Kryll farms

Unlocks food:
Algae-Kryll Goo

ResearchProjectDef.label: AR - Power Bacteria
ResearchProjectDef.description:
After gaining experience with the genetically modified Algae-Kryll, your colonists desire
to push DNA tampering one step further. They will create an inedible bacteria strain that
can produce small quantities of electricity. Using a waterproof battery as a base structure
and a good quantity of mineral-proteic compound they should be able to build a battery that will work for years.

One of you also suspects that it might be possible to use a small version of the bacteria battery to upgrade those crappy weapons you found in the escape pods.

Unlocks Building:
Bacteria Battery

Unlock Weapon Upgrading:
Pistols and Survival Rifles can be upgraded at the Large Bacteria Battery

ResearchProjectDef.label: AR - OUR Rimworld
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Experience with bacteria batteries and energy weapons has led to unexpected results. "According to SCIENCE!" your colonists think they should be able to craft guns or even
design new, advanced technologies. Afterall, in the dark alleys of the pirate merchant
homeworlds, "Back alley Workshops" are pretty common. On a Rimworld, it's legal too.

Unlocks Building:
Back Alley Workshop

Unlock Weapon Crafting:
Produces cheap and effective weapons
Handcraft Advanced ones

Unlock Armour Crafting:
Unlocks recycling slag chunks into crude heavy armour
